title: Artifact (SpliceHack)
data:
Below is a list of **[artifacts](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact")** that appear in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack").

Note that artifact wishing odds are based off the amount of previous artifact gifted or wished for, rather than total artifacts generated.

## Non-quest artifacts

Some of these artifacts have randomly-selected base items.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

- Grants acid resistance.                                                                                                                                            | SpliceHack               |

* Allows the wielder to invoke Excalibur.                                                                                                | SpliceHack               |

- Upon hitting an opponent, it destroys a random piece of their armor.
